# llms.txt for garrettawolfe.com

# About
Garrett Wolfe is a growth operator, entrepreneur, and GTM consultant based in NYC. He helps early and growth-stage companies build durable, signal-driven RevOps and outbound systems.

# Contact
Email: GarrettWolfe.work@gmail.com

Twitter: https://x.com/garrettawolfe
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/garrettawolfe
Film Photography: https://www.instagram.com/wolfe.film

# Current Work
- OneGTM: Founder & GTM Engineer (Sep 2025 - Present)
- Looking for technical co-founder in NYC

# Experience
- Galaxy: Co-Founder & CRO (May 2025 - Sep 2025)
- Unify: Growth & Bizops - 9th Employee (Apr 2024 - Jun 2025)
- TZP Group: Growth Equity Associate (Aug 2022 - Mar 2024)
- Morgan Stanley: Investment Banking Analyst - Global Technology Group (Jul 2020 - Jul 2022)
- Duke University: Computer Science (2016 - 2020)

GTM Tooling (Clay, n8n, Cursor, RB2B), SQL, Data Analysis, Python, Java, 35mm Film Photography
